alert.note: Alert for Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 3:58PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Mobile County through 445 PM CDT... At 357 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Mobile Regional Airport, or 6 miles northwest of Tillmans Corner, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Tillmans Corner, Saraland, Theodore, Chickasaw, Grand Bay, Bayou La Batre, Chunchula, Semmes, Tanner Williams, I65 And I165, Coden, Mobile Regional Airport, Wilmer, I65 And AL 158 and I10 And I65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland
